anya-e0904n:10_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0904n:10_2: vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttasaṅkhāte tayo nikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0904n:11_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0904n:11_2: vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttasaṅkhāte tayo nikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0904n:11_3: navahi ca suttasahassehi pañcahi ca suttasattehi sattapaññāsāya ca suttehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ vīsatibhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ
anya-e0904n:12_1: aṅguttaranikāyepi āvuso ekakanipāto dukanipāto tikanipātotiādinā nipātapakaraṇaparicchedavasena ekādasavidhā.
anya-e0904n:13_1: aṅguttaranikāye bhante ekādasasu nipātapakaraṇaparicchedesu ekakanipātaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n:15_1: ekakanipātepi āvuso rūpādivaggo nīvaraṇappahānavaggo akammaniyavaggotiādinā vaggabhedavasena bahuvidhā.
anya-e0904n:16_1: ekakanipāte bhante rūpādivaggo nīvaraṇappahānavaggotiādinā vīsatiyā vaggesu rūpādivaggaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n:17_2: mayampi dāni āvuso tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgāhanatthāya saṃgītipubbaṅgamāni dhammapucchanavissajjanakiccāni āvahituṃ samārabhāma.
anya-e0904n:17_3: Tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte rūpādivagge purimāni
anya-e0904n:17_4: pañca suttāni kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:18_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha rūpādigarukānaṃ pañcannaṃ purisānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:18_2: yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0904n:18_4: itthirūpaṃ bhikkhave purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:19_1: yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0904n:19_3: itthirūpaṃ bhikkhave purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0904n:20_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pacchimāni pañca suttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:21_1: tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha rūpādigarukānaṃ pañcannaṃ itthīnaṃ ajjhāsayavasena
anya-e0904n:21_3: yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0904n:21_5: purisarūpaṃ bhikkhave itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:22_1: yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0904n:22_3: purisarūpaṃ bhikkhave itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0904n:24_1: imasmiṃ āvuso rūpādivagge bhagavatā nītatthavasena kiṃ kathitaṃ,
anya-e0904n:25_1: imasmiṃ bhante rūpādivagge bhagavatā nītatthavasena vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:27_0: Pucchā – dutiyo pana āvuso nīvaraṇappahānavaggo bhagavatā kattha kathañca bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:28_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:28_3: uppanno vā kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n:28_5: subhanimittaṃ bhikkhave ayoniso manasikaroto anuppannoceva kāmacchando uppajjati,
anya-e0904n:28_6: uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:29_0: Pucchā – imasmiṃ pana āvuso dutiye nīvaraṇappahānavagge bhagavatā kiṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:30_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ pana bhante dutiye nīvaraṇappahānavagge bhagavatā vaṭṭampi vivaṭṭampi kathitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:32_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte tatiye akammaniyavagge kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:33_1: tatiye bhante akammaniyavagge “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:33_8: Cittaṃ bhikkhave bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hotī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:35_0: Pucchā – catutthe panāvuso adantavagge bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:36_1: catutthe bhante adantavagge “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:36_2: yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n:36_4: cittaṃ bhikkhave adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0904n:36_6: yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n:36_8: cittaṃ bhikkhave dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:38_0: Pucchā – pañcame āvuso paṇihitaacchavagge bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:39_1: pañcame bhante paṇihitaacchavagge “seyyathāpi bhikkhave sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā micchāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena
anya-e0904n:39_2: vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati,
anya-e0904n:39_3: lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhāna vijjati.
anya-e0904n:39_6: Evameva kho bhikkhave so vata bhikkhu micchāpaṇihitena cittena avijjaṃ bhecchati,
anya-e0904n:39_10: micchāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave cittassā”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:41_0: Pucchā – accharāsaṅghātavagge āvuso paṭhama dutiyasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:44_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyasuttādīni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:45_1: tattheva bhante tatiyasuttādīni pañcasuttāni “accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce bhikkhave bhikkhu mettācittaṃ āsevati, bhāveti,
anya-e0904n:45_3: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0904n:45_4: ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkaronti.
anya-e0904n:45_5: Yekeci bhikkhave dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā,
anya-e0904n:45_9: yekeci bhikkhave dhammā kusalā kusalabhāgiyā kusalapakkhikā,
anya-e0904n:45_12: anvadeva kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:47_1: tattheva āvuso aṭṭhama navama dasamasuttāni ca vīriyārambhādivagge dasasuttāni ca kalyāṇamittādivagge paṭhamasuttañca bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:48_1: tattheva bhante aṭṭhama navama dasamasuttāni ca vīriyārambhādivagge dasasuttāni ca kalyāṇamittādivagge
anya-e0904n:48_3: yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n:48_6: pamattassa bhikkhave anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n:48_7: uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:50_0: Pucchā – kalyāṇamittādivagge āvuso dutiya tatiyasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:51_1: kalyāṇamittādivagge bhante dutiya tatiyasuttāni “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:51_2: yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n:51_4: yathayidaṃ bhikkhave anuyogo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ananuyogo kusalānaṃ dhammāna”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:53_1: tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhasuttādīni ca pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttañca bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:54_1: tattheva bhante chaṭṭhasuttādīni ca pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttañca “appamattikā esā bhikkhave parihāni yadidaṃ ñātiparihāni.
anya-e0904n:54_2: Etaṃ patikiṭṭhaṃ bhikkhave parihānīnaṃ yadidaṃ paññāparihānīti.
anya-e0904n:54_3: Appamattikā esā bhikkhave vuddhi yadidaṃ ñātivuddhi.
anya-e0904n:54_6: Evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:56_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena pamādādivagge dutiyasuttādīni kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:57_8: appamādo bhikkhave mahato anatthāya saṃvattatīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:59_0: Pucchā – dutiye panāvuso pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttādīni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:60_1: dutiye bhante pamādādivagge ajjhattikaṃ bhikkhave aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:60_5: Ajjhattikaṃ bhikkhave aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:60_8: Appamādo bhikkhave mahato atthāya saṃvattatīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:62_1: tattheva āvuso tettiṃsamādīnica dasasuttāni adhammavagge ca dasasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:63_1: tattheva bhante tettiṃsamādīni dasasuttāni ca adhammavagge dasasuttāni ca ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū adhammaṃ “dhammo”ti dīpenti,
anya-e0904n:63_2: te bhikkhave bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:63_3: Bahuñca te bhikkhave bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti,
anya-e0904n:63_4: te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentīti evamādinā ca,
anya-e0904n:63_5: ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū adhammaṃ “adhammo”ti dīpenti,
anya-e0904n:63_6: te bhikkhave bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya bahujano janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:63_7: Bahuñca te bhikkhave bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti,
anya-e0904n:63_8: te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentīti evamādinā ca bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:65_0: Pucchā – ekapuggalavagge āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:66_1: ekapuggalavagge bhante bhagavatā ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya
anya-e0904n:66_5: ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya
anya-e0904n:66_6: atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:69_1: etadavagge āvuso āgatesu ekacattālīsāya theresu āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:70_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti,
anya-e0904n:70_2: evaṃ kho bhante āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:72_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā
anya-e0904n:72_3: ca sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati paṭhamo aggasāvako āyasmā ca mahāmoggallānatthero dutiyo aggasāvako
anya-e0904n:73_1: āyasmā bhante sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti.
anya-e0904n:73_2: Āyasmā pana mahāmoggallānatthero “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti.
anya-e0904n:73_3: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:74_0: Idaṃ te āsanaṃ vīra, paññattaṃ tavanucchaviṃ;
anya-e0904n:76_0: Ye vata loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhu aññataro.
anya-e0904n:77_0: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyaṃ.
anya-e0904n:82_0: Labheyyāma mayaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0904n:83_0: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto.
anya-e0904n:84_0: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno.
anya-e0904n:86_1: āyasmā pana āvuso mahākassapatthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle pāmokkhasaṅghanāyakabhūto bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:87_1: āyasmā bhante mahākassapatthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle saṅghapāmokkhabhūto “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama
anya-e0904n:87_3: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:89_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā anuruddhatthero kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:90_1: āyasmā bhante anuruddhatthero “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ
anya-e0904n:90_2: anuruddho”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:92_0: Pucchā – āyasmā pana āvuso sīvalitthero bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:93_1: āyasmā bhante sīvalitthero “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvalī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:94_0: Sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0904n:95_0: Suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno.
anya-e0904n:96_0: Susukhaṃ vata nibbānaṃ, yatthidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjati –
anya-e0904n:97_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvali” hu –
anya-e0904n:99_1: āyasmā pana āvuso ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle dhammavissajjakatherabhūto kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:100_1: āyasmā bhante ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle dhammavissajjakabhūto “etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n:100_2: bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando.
anya-e0904n:100_3: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando.
anya-e0904n:100_4: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gatimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando.
anya-e0904n:100_5: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhitimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando.
anya-e0904n:100_6: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā pañcasu etadaggaṭṭhānesu ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:107_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā
anya-e0904n:107_3: upālitthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle vinayavissajjakabhūto kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:108_1: āyasmā bhante upālitthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle vinayavissajjakabhūto “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ
anya-e0904n:108_2: bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:114_1: etadaggavagge āvuso āgatāsu terasasu therīsu mahāpajāpati gotamītherī kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:115_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu terasasu therīsu mahāpajāpatigotamītherī “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ
anya-e0904n:115_2: bhikkhunīnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ mahāpajāpati gotamī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:116_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamī” –
anya-e0904n:117_0: Pucchā – khemātherī pana āvuso aggasāvikā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:118_1: khemātherī bhante paṭhamā aggasāvikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ
anya-e0904n:118_2: khemā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:123_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ khemā” –
anya-e0904n:124_0: Pucchā – uppalavaṇṇā pana āvuso therī dutiyaaggasāvikā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:125_1: uppalavaṇṇā bhante therī dutiyaaggasāvikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ
anya-e0904n:125_2: yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:126_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā” –
anya-e0904n:128_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu terasasu therīsu paṭācārānāma therī kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:129_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu terasasu therikāsu paṭācārā therī “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
anya-e0904n:129_2: vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:148_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā” –
anya-e0904n:150_0: Pucchā – dhammadinnā pana āvuso therī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:151_1: dhammadinnā bhante therī “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā”ti
anya-e0904n:151_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:156_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā” –
anya-e0904n:158_0: Pucchā – bhaddakaccānānāma āvuso yasodharātherī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:159_1: bhaddakaccānā bhante yasodharātherī bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā”ti.
anya-e0904n:160_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā” –
anya-e0904n:162_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu tapussabhallikānāma vāṇijā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:163_1: tapussabhallikā bhante vāṇijā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā”ti,
anya-e0904n:163_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:164_0: “Ete bhante mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca,
anya-e0904n:164_1: upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate” hu –
anya-e0904n:165_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā” –
anya-e0904n:167_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:168_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:168_2: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko”ti.
anya-e0904n:168_3: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:169_0: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko–
anya-e0904n:171_0: Pucchā – sūrambaṭṭho nāma āvuso upāsako bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:172_1: sūrambaṭṭho upāsako “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho”ti
anya-e0904n:172_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:173_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho” hu –
anya-e0904n:175_1: etadaggavagge āvuso āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu sujātānāma upāsikā seniyadhītā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:176_1: sujātā bhante seniyadhītā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā”ti,
anya-e0904n:176_2: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:177_0: “Etā mayaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca,
anya-e0904n:177_1: upāsikāyo no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetā saraṇaṃ gatā” hu –
anya-e0904n:178_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā” –
anya-e0904n:180_0: Pucchā – visākhā pana āvuso upāsikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:181_1: visākhā bhante upāsikā migāramātā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā
anya-e0904n:181_2: migāramātā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:182_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā migāramātā” hu –
anya-e0904n:184_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarānāma upāsikā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:185_1: etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarā upāsikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ
anya-e0904n:185_2: upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:186_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā” hu –
anya-e0904n:188_0: Pucchā – kāḷīnāma āvuso upāsikā kuraragharikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:189_1: kāḷī bhante upāsikā kuraragharikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī
anya-e0904n:189_2: upāsikā kuraragharikā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:190_0: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī upāsikā kuraragharikā” –
anya-e0904n:192_0: Pucchā – sakalāpi āvuso aṭṭhānapāḷi bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0904n:193_2: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañcisaṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya,
anya-e0904n:193_6: ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalāpi aṭṭhānapāḷi bhāsitā.
anya-e0904n:195_0: Pucchā – ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ āvuso paṭhamavagge kīdisī dhammadesanā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0904n:196_1: ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ bhante paṭhamavagge “ekadhammo bhikkhave bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya
anya-e0904n:196_2: nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0904n:196_5: ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya
anya-e0904n:196_6: sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanā desitā.
anya-e0904n:197_0: Pucchā – dutiyavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:198_1: dutiyavagge bhante bhagavatā “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:198_2: yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n:198_3: uppannā vā akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti,
anya-e0904n:198_5: Micchādiṭṭhikassa bhikkhave anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n:198_6: uppannā ca akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
anya-e0904n:200_0: Pucchā – tatiyavagge pana āvuso pañcamādīni aṭṭha suttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:201_1: tatiyavagge bhante pañcamādīni aṭṭhasuttāni “durakkhāte bhikkhave dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti,
anya-e0904n:201_7: Svākkhāte bhikkhave dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti,
anya-e0904n:201_12: Taṃkissahetu svākkhātattā bhikkhave dhammassā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:203_0: Pucchā – aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:204_1: aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagge bhante “accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0904n:204_2: ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0904n:204_3: ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti evamādikā bhante bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:206_0: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso kāyagatāsativaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:207_1: yassa kassaci bhikkhave mahāsamuddo cetasā phuṭo,
anya-e0904n:207_3: evameva bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā,
anya-e0904n:207_4: antogadhā tassa kusalā dhammā yekeci vijjābhāgiyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi kāyagatāsativaggo bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:209_0: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso amatavaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsato.
anya-e0904n:210_8: yesaṃ kāyagatāsati paribhuttāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi amatavaggo bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:212_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte kammakaraṇavagge paṭhamaṃ vajjasuttaṃ kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:213_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave vajjāni.
anya-e0904n:213_2: Katamāni dve diṭṭhadhammikañca vajjaṃ samparāyikañca vajja”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:214_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikassa vajjassa bhāyissāma,
anya-e0904n:216_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ padhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:217_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave padhānāni durabhisambhavāni lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:217_4: yañca agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattaṃ padhānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:217_5: Imāni kho bhikkhave dve padhānāni durabhisambhavāni lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:219_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:220_3: idha bhikkhave ekaccassa kāyaduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n:220_13: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā tapanīyāti.
anya-e0904n:222_0: Pucchā – catutthaṃ pana āvuso atapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:223_1: catutthaṃ bhante atapanīyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā atapanīyā.
anya-e0904n:223_3: idha bhikkhave ekaccassa kāyasucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n:223_14: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā atapanīyā”ti.
anya-e0904n:225_0: Pucchā – pañcamaṃ pana āvuso upaññātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:226_1: pañcamaṃ bhante upaññātasuttaṃ “dvinnāhaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ upaññāsiṃ.
anya-e0904n:226_5: taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu upasussatu sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ,
anya-e0904n:226_6: yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ,
anya-e0904n:226_7: na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0904n:228_0: Pucchā – navamaṃ pana āvuso cariyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:229_1: navamaṃ bhante cariyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā sukkā lokaṃ pālenti.
anya-e0904n:229_4: Ime kho bhikkhave dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
anya-e0904n:231_1: adhikaraṇavagge pana āvuso sattamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:232_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:232_2: Jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n:232_3: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃmaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
anya-e0904n:232_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃmaraṇā
anya-e0904n:232_5: apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:233_0: Ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n:233_1: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n:234_0: “Katattāca brāhmaṇa akatattāca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti” –
anya-e0904n:235_0: Ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n:235_1: yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti –
anya-e0904n:236_0: Katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n:237_0: Na kho ahaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ –
anya-e0904n:238_0: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu.
anya-e0904n:240_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:241_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmato ānandassa “ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda akaraṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyaduccaritaṃ manoduccarita”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:242_0: “Ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda karaṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyasucaritaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ manosucaritaṃ” –
anya-e0904n:244_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte adhikaraṇavagge navamasuttaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:245_3: Nocedaṃ bhikkhave sakkā abhavissa akusalaṃ pajahituṃ,
anya-e0904n:245_5: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave sakkā akusalaṃ pajahituṃ,
anya-e0904n:245_7: Akusalañca hidaṃ bhikkhave pahīnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyya,
anya-e0904n:245_9: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave akusalaṃ pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n:245_10: tasmāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi “akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahathā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:247_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaekādasamasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:248_1: tattheva bhante dasamaekādasamasuttāni “dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n:248_4: dunnikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
anya-e0904n:248_5: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca.
anya-e0904n:248_6: “Dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n:248_9: sunikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.
anya-e0904n:248_10: Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca.
anya-e0904n:251_0: Pucchā – bālavagge pana āvuso dutiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:252_1: bālavagge bhante dutiyaṃ suttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:252_3: duṭṭho vā dosantaro saddho vā duggahitena.
anya-e0904n:252_4: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantī”ti,
anya-e0904n:254_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:255_1: tattheva bhante tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:255_3: yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpeti.
anya-e0904n:255_4: Yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti’ dīpeti.
anya-e0904n:255_5: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:255_8: yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpeti.
anya-e0904n:255_9: Yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpeti.
anya-e0904n:255_10: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhantī”ti,
anya-e0904n:257_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthapañcamasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:258_1: tattheva bhante catutthapañcamasuttāni “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:258_3: yo ca neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ ‘nītattho suttanto’ti dīpeti,
anya-e0904n:258_4: yo ca nītatthaṃ suttantaṃ ‘neyyattho suttanto’ti dīpetī”ti,
anya-e0904n:260_0: Pucchā – samacittavagge āvuso paṭhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:261_1: samacittavagge bhante paṭhamasuttaṃ “asappurisabhūmiñca vo bhikkhave desessāmi sappurisabhūmiñca,
anya-e0904n:263_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:264_1: tattheva bhante dutiyasuttaṃ “dvinnāhaṃ bhikkhave na suppatikāra vadāmi.
anya-e0904n:266_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ samacittasuttaṃ kattha kassa kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:267_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “ajjhattasaṃyojanañca āvuso puggalaṃ desessāmi bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca,
anya-e0904n:268_0: Sādhukaṃ manasikarothā”ti, evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:270_0: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso tattha bhagavā ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0904n:271_1: tattha bhante bhagavā “tasmātiha sāriputta evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘santindriyā bhavissāma santamānasā’ti.
anya-e0904n:271_2: Evañhi vo sāriputta sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0904n:272_0: “Eso bhante āyasmā sāriputto pubbārāme migāramātupāsā de bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ deseti bahiddhā saṃyojanañca” –
anya-e0904n:273_0: Sādhu bhante bhagavā yena āyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāya.
anya-e0904n:274_0: Tā kho pana sāriputta devatā dasapi hutvā vīsampi hutvā tiṃsampi hutvā cattālīsampi hutvā paññāsampi
anya-e0904n:275_0: Tasmātiha sāriputta evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ santindriyā bhavissāma santamānasā.
anya-e0904n:278_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte parisavagge paṭhamaṃ uttānasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:279_3: uttānā ca parisā gambhīrā ca parisā,
anya-e0904n:279_5: idha bhikkhave yassaṃ parisāyaṃ bhikkhū uddhatā honti unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā.
anya-e0904n:279_6: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave uttānā parisā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:281_0: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ parisānaṃ yadidaṃ gambhīrā parisā.
anya-e0904n:283_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ anaggavatīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:284_1: tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ anaggavatīsuttaṃ “dvemā bhikkhave parisā.
anya-e0904n:284_3: anaggavatī ca parisā aggavatī ca parisā.
anya-e0904n:284_5: idha bhikkhave yassaṃ parisāyaṃ therā bhikkhū bāhulikā honti sāthalikā,
anya-e0904n:284_8: na vīriyaṃ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikabhassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:286_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ okkācitavinītasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:287_1: tattheva bhante chaṭṭhaṃ okkācitavinītasuttaṃ “dvemā bhikkhave parisā.
anya-e0904n:287_4: paṭipucchā vinītā parisā no okkācitavinītā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:290_0: Pucchā – puggalavagge āvuso ekādasamaṃ asantasannivāsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:291_1: puggalavagge bhante ekādasamaṃ asantasannivāsasuttaṃ “asantasannivāsañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi santasannivāsañca,
anya-e0904n:291_3: sādhukaṃ manasikarotha bhāsissāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:293_0: Pucchā – sukhavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:294_5: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sukhānaṃ yadidaṃ pabbajitasukha”nti evamādikā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:296_0: Pucchā – āyācanavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā paṭhamādīni cattāri suttāni kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:297_1: āyācanavagge bhante paṭhamādīni cattāri suttāni “saddho bhikkhave bhikkhu evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya tādiso homi,
anya-e0904n:299_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:300_1: tattheva bhante pañcamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ “dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati,
anya-e0904n:300_2: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ,
anya-e0904n:302_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte āyācanavagge chaṭṭhaṃ appasādanīyasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:303_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante appasādanīyasuttaṃ “dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati,
anya-e0904n:303_2: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ,
anya-e0904n:303_5: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
anya-e0904n:303_6: ananuvicca apariyo gāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃsetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:305_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mātāpitusuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:306_1: tattheva bhante sattamaṃ mātāpitusuttaṃ “dvīsu bhikkhave micchā paṭipajjamāno bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati,
anya-e0904n:306_2: sāvajjo ca hohi sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ,
anya-e0904n:306_5: mātari ca pitari cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:308_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:309_1: tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatasuttaṃ “dvīsu bhikkhave micchāpaṭipajjamāno bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati,
anya-e0904n:309_2: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ,
anya-e0904n:309_5: tathāgate ca tathāgatasāvake cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:312_0: Pucchā – tikanipāte pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ bhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:313_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ “yāni kānici bhikkhave bhayāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n:313_2: sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato.
anya-e0904n:313_6: sabbete bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:315_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ cintīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:316_1: tattheva bhante cintīsuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni.
anya-e0904n:316_3: idha bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:318_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ accayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:319_1: tattheva bhante catutthaṃ accayasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
anya-e0904n:319_4: parassa kho pana accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhātī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:321_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ malasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:322_1: tattheva bhante dasamaṃ malasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato tayo male appahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
anya-e0904n:322_8: maccharamalañcassa appahīnaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:324_0: Pucchā – rathakāravagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ ñātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:325_1: paṭhamaṃ bhante ñātasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno
anya-e0904n:325_2: hoti bahujana dukkhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:325_6: ananulomikesu dhammesu samādapetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:327_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ āsaṃsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:328_1: tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ āsaṃsasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:328_2: Katame tayo nirāso āsaṃso”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:330_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte rathakāravagge pañcamaṃ sacetanasuttaṃ kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:331_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave rājā ahosi sacetano nāma,
anya-e0904n:331_2: atha kho bhikkhave rājā sacetano rathakāraṃ āmantesi ito me samma rathakāra channaṃ māsānaṃ paccayena
anya-e0904n:331_3: saṅgāmo bhavissati sakkhissasi me samma rathakāra navaṃ cakkayugaṃ kātu”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:333_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:334_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante apaṇṇakasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
anya-e0904n:334_2: yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
anya-e0904n:334_4: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti,
anya-e0904n:336_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ devalokasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:337_1: tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ devalokasuttaṃ “sace vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ “devalokūpapattiyā
anya-e0904n:337_3: Nanu tumhe bhikkhave evaṃ puṭṭhā aṭṭīyeyyātha harāyeyyātha jiguccheyyāthā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:339_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ paṭhamapāpaṇikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:340_1: tattheva bhante navamaṃ paṭhamapāpaṇikasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgato pāpaṇiko abhabbo anadhigataṃ vā bhogaṃ adhigantuṃ,
anya-e0904n:340_4: idha bhikkhave pāpaṇiko pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhātī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:343_0: Pucchā – puggalavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ gilānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:344_1: puggalavagge bhante dutiyaṃ gilānasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave gilānā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:344_3: idha bhikkhave ekacco gilāno labhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni,
anya-e0904n:344_4: labhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni,
anya-e0904n:344_5: labhanto vā patirūpaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ alabhanto vā patirūpaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:346_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ bahukārasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:347_1: tattheva bhante catutthaṃ bahukārasuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave puggalā puggalassa bahukārā.
anya-e0904n:347_3: yaṃ bhikkhave puggalaṃ āgamma puggalo buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
anya-e0904n:347_6: Ayaṃ bhikkhave puggalo imassa puggalassa bahukāro”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:349_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte puggalavagge sattamaṃ jigucchitabbasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:350_1: sattamaṃ bhante jigucchitabbasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:350_3: atthi bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo,
anya-e0904n:350_4: atthi bhikkhave puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo,
anya-e0904n:350_5: atthi bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:351_1: kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā jigucchitabbo puggalo nasevitabbo nabhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:352_1: “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
anya-e0904n:352_2: Idha bhikkhave ekacco dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño
anya-e0904n:352_4: evarūpo bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n:352_5: bhagavatā jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:353_1: kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā ajjhupekkhitabbo puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:354_1: katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo,
anya-e0904n:354_2: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo,
anya-e0904n:354_3: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati,
anya-e0904n:354_4: kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo
anya-e0904n:354_5: na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:355_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā sevitabbo puggalo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:356_1: “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo,
anya-e0904n:356_2: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo,
anya-e0904n:356_3: evarūpo bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sevitabbo
anya-e0904n:358_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puggalavagge aṭṭhamaṃ gūthabhāṇīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:359_1: tattheva bhante puggalavagge aṭṭhamaṃ gūthabhāṇīsuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:359_3: gūthabhāṇī pupphabhāṇī madhubhāṇī”ti evaṃ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:361_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā gūthabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:362_2: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagatovā pūgamajjhagatovā rājakulamajjhagatovā
anya-e0904n:362_9: Iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.
anya-e0904n:362_11: evaṃ kho bhante tattha bhagavatā gūthabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:364_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā pupphabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:365_2: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagatovā rājakulamajjhagato
anya-e0904n:365_3: vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho “ehambho purisa yaṃ pajānāsi,
anya-e0904n:365_9: iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā na sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti,
anya-e0904n:365_11: evaṃ kho bhante tattha bhagavatā pupphabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:367_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā madhubhāṇī puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:368_2: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato
anya-e0904n:369_0: Hotīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha madhubhāṇī puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:371_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puggalavagge navamaṃ andhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:372_1: tattheva bhante puggalavagge navamaṃ andhasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:373_0: Pucchā – kīdiso āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā andho akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:374_1: yassa bhante bhogesu ceva dhammesu ca paññācakkhu natthi,
anya-e0904n:374_2: ediso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā andho akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:375_0: Pucchā – kīdiso pana āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā ekacakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:376_1: yassa bhante bhogesuyeva paññācakkhu atthi na dhammesu.
anya-e0904n:376_2: Īdiso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā ekacakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:377_0: Pucchā – kīdiso pana āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā dvicakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:378_1: yassa bhante bhogesu ceva dhammesu ca paññācakkhu atthi,
anya-e0904n:378_2: īdiso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā dvicakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:380_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte puggalavagge dasamaṃ avakujjasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:381_1: dasamaṃ bhante avakujjasuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:381_3: avakujjapañño puggalo ucchaṅgapañño puggalo puthupañño puggalo.
anya-e0904n:381_5: Idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ārāmaṃ gantā hoti abhikkhaṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammassavanāya,
anya-e0904n:381_6: tassa bhikkhū dhammaṃ desentiādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsenti.
anya-e0904n:381_7: So tasmiṃ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya nevādiṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0904n:381_10: vuṭṭhitopi tamhā āsanā tassā kathāya nevādiṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0904n:381_12: na pariyosānaṃ manasikarotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:383_0: Pucchā – devadūtavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sabrahmakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:384_1: devadūtavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sabrahmakasuttaṃ “sabrahmakāni bhikkhave tāni kulāni,
anya-e0904n:384_2: yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti.
anya-e0904n:384_4: yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti.
anya-e0904n:384_6: yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti.
anya-e0904n:384_11: bahukārā bhikkhave mātāpitaro puttānaṃ āpādakā posakā imassa lokassa dassetāro”ti,
anya-e0904n:387_0: Tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito;
anya-e0904n:388_0: Annena atha pānena, vatthena sayanena ca;
anya-e0904n:391_0: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatīti –
anya-e0904n:392_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ hatthakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:393_1: pañcamaṃ bhante hatthakasuttaṃ āḷaviyaṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:393_2: Hatthako bhante āḷavako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kacci bhante bhagavā sukhamasayitthā”ti.
anya-e0904n:393_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti,
anya-e0904n:393_4: ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:395_0: “Evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha, ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”.
anya-e0904n:396_0: “Evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha, ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”.
anya-e0904n:406_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte devadūtavagge chaṭṭhaṃ devadūtasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:407_3: idha bhikkhave ekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ carati,
anya-e0904n:407_6: So kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0904n:407_7: maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0904n:407_8: Tamenaṃ bhikkhave nirayapālā nānābāhāsu gahetvā yamassa rañño dassenti-
anya-e0904n:407_9: ayaṃ deva puriso amatteyyo apetteyyo asāmañño abrahmañño,
anya-e0904n:408_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño paṭhamadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:409_1: tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati “ambho purisa
anya-e0904n:409_2: na tvaṃ addasa manussesu paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño
anya-e0904n:410_0: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n:412_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño dutiyadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:413_1: tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā samanubhāsitvā dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ
anya-e0904n:413_2: samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati “ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti
anya-e0904n:413_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño dutiyā devadūtasamanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:414_0: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu dutiya devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n:415_0: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthīṃ vā purisaṃ vā ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ sake muttakarīse
anya-e0904n:415_1: palipannaṃ semānaṃ aññehi vuṭṭhāpiyamānaṃ aññehi saṃvesiyamānaṃ” –
anya-e0904n:417_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño tatiyadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:418_1: tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā samanubhāsitvā tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ
anya-e0904n:418_2: samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati “ambho purisa natvaṃ manussesu tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtanti”
anya-e0904n:418_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño tatiyā devadūtasamanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:419_0: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n:420_0: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ vā tīhamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ” –
anya-e0904n:422_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā nerayikassa sattassa niraya dukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:423_1: tamenaṃ bhikkhave “yamo rājā tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā samanubhāsitvā tuṇhī hoti.
anya-e0904n:423_2: Tamenaṃ bhikkhave nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ karonti,
anya-e0904n:423_8: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayati,
anya-e0904n:423_10: yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantīhotī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā nerayikassa nirayadukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:425_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṃvejanīyakathā kathitā.
anya-e0904n:426_1: bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave yamassa rañño etadahosi “ye kira bho loke pāpakāni kammāni karonti,
anya-e0904n:426_4: tathāgato ca loke uppajjeyya arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā saṃvejanīyakathā kathitā.
anya-e0904n:427_0: “Ye kira bho loke pāpakāni kammāni karonti”.
anya-e0904n:430_0: Ye ca kho devadūtehi, santo sappurisā idha;
anya-e0904n:437_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte devadūtavagge aṭṭhamaṃ catumahārājasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:438_1: aṭṭhamaṃ bhante catumahārājasuttaṃ “aṭṭhamiyaṃ bhikkhave pakkhassa catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ amaccā pārisajjā
anya-e0904n:438_2: imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicaranti kacci bahū manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino,
anya-e0904n:439_0: Appakā kho mārisā manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino,
anya-e0904n:440_0: “Dibbā vata bho kāyā parihāyissanti, paripūrissanti asura kāyā” –
anya-e0904n:441_0: Bahū kho mārisā manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino,
anya-e0904n:442_0: “Dibbā vata bho kāyā paripūrissanti, parihāyissanti asura kāyā” –
anya-e0904n:444_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ ādhipateyyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:445_1: tattheva bhante dasamaṃ ādhipateyyasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave ādhipateyyāni.
anya-e0904n:445_5: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:447_1: brāhmaṇavagge āvuso catutthaṃ paribbājakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:448_1: brāhmaṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ paribbājakasuttaṃ aññataraṃ brāhmaṇa paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:448_2: Aññataro bhante brāhmaṇaparibbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sanniṭṭhiko dhammo sandiṭṭhiko dhammoti bho gotama vuccati,
anya-e0904n:448_3: kittāvatānu kho bho gotama sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti.
anya-e0904n:448_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ratto kho brāhmaṇa rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti,
anya-e0904n:448_11: nacetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:450_1: tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ vacchagottasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:451_1: sattamaṃ bhante vacchagottasuttaṃ vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:451_2: Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bho gotama samaṇo gotamo evamāha “mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0904n:451_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye te vaccha evamāhaṃsu samaṇo gotamo evamāha mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0904n:453_1: tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ saṅgāravasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:454_1: dasamaṃ bhante saṅgāravasuttaṃ saṅgāravaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:454_2: Saṅgāravo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “mayamassu bho gotama brāhmaṇā nāma yaññaṃ yajāmapi yajāpemapi,
anya-e0904n:454_3: tatra bho gotama yo ceva yajati yo ca yajāpeti,
anya-e0904n:454_4: sabbe te anekasārīrikaṃ puññappaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā honti,
anya-e0904n:454_6: yopanāyaṃ bho gotama yassa vā kulā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito ekamattānaṃ dameti,
anya-e0904n:454_11: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tenahi brāhmaṇa taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0904n:454_13: tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:455_0: “Iccāyapi bho gotama evaṃ bhante anekasārīrikā puññappaṭipadā hoti” –
anya-e0904n:456_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiya anusandhimhi bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanā desitā.
anya-e0904n:457_1: tattheva bhante dutiye anusandhimhi tividhā pāṭihāriyā paṭisaṃyuttā dhammadesanā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0904n:458_0: “Seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo bhavañcānando, ete me pujjā ete me pāsaṃsā” –
anya-e0904n:459_0: “Seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo bhavañcānando, ete me pujjā ete me pāsaṃsā” –
anya-e0904n:461_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanimāte mahāvagge tatiyaṃ venāgapurasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:462_1: kosalesu bhante venāgapure nāma brāhmaṇānaṃ gāme venāgapurikaṃ vacchagottaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:462_2: Venāgapuriko bhante vacchagotto brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “acchariyaṃ bho gotama,
anya-e0904n:462_5: parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto (peyyāla) evarūpānaṃ nūna bhavaṃ gotamo uccāsayana mahāsayanānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī”ti.
anya-e0904n:462_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yāni kho pana tāni brāhmaṇa uccāsayana mahāsayanāni.
anya-e0904n:462_8: āsandi pallaṅko gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomī ekantalomī kaṭṭissaṃ koseyyaṃ
anya-e0904n:462_9: kuṭṭakaṃ hatthattharaṃ assattharaṃ rathattharaṃ ajinappaveṇī kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ sauttaracchadaṃ
anya-e0904n:462_12: laddhā ca pana nakappantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:465_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dibbaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:466_1: idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇa yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi,
anya-e0904n:466_2: so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi,
anya-e0904n:466_3: so pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā dibbaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:468_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā brahmaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:469_1: idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi,
anya-e0904n:469_2: so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmīti evamādinā
anya-e0904n:470_0: Katamaṃ pana taṃ bho gotama brahmauccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ.
anya-e0904n:472_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:473_1: idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇa yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi,
anya-e0904n:473_2: so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi.
anya-e0904n:473_3: So pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapāta paṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:474_1: tattheva āvuso mahāvagge pañcamaṃ kesamuttisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:475_1: kosalesu bhante kesamuttenāma kālāmānaṃ nigame kesamuttiye kālāme ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:475_2: Kesamuttiyā bhante kālāmā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ “santi bhante eke samaṇa brāhmaṇā kesamuttaṃ āgacchanti,
anya-e0904n:475_6: aparepi bhante eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kesamuttaṃ āgacchanti,
anya-e0904n:475_10: Tesaṃ no bhante amhākaṃ hoteva kaṅkhā,
anya-e0904n:475_11: hoti vicikicchā ko su nāma imesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ āha,
anya-e0904n:475_13: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “alañhi vo kālāmā kaṅkhituṃ alaṃ vicikicchituṃ,
anya-e0904n:475_14: kaṅkhīyeva pana vo ṭhāne vicikicchā uppannā”ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:477_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte mahāvagge dasamaṃ uposathasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:478_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ ārabbha “tayo kho me visākhe uposathā.
anya-e0904n:478_3: Gopālakuposatho nigaṇṭhuposatho ariyuposatho”ti evaṃ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:479_0: Handa kuto nu tvaṃ visākhe āgacchasi divā divassa.
anya-e0904n:480_0: “Tayo kho me visākhe uposathā. Katame tayo, gopālakuposatho nigaṇṭhuposatho ariyuposatho” –
anya-e0904n:482_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā gopālakuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:483_2: seyyathāpi visākhe gopālako sāyanhasamaye sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati “ajja kho gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese cariṃsu,
anya-e0904n:484_0: Sve dāni gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese carissanti,
anya-e0904n:484_1: amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese pānīyāni pivissantī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā gopālakuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:486_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā nigaṇṭhuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:487_4: “ehitvaṃ ambhopurisa ye puratthimāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ,
anya-e0904n:487_8: Ye dakkhiṇāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ,
anya-e0904n:487_9: tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā nigaṇṭhuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:489_0: Ehi tvaṃ ambho purisa sabbacelāni nikkhipitvā evaṃ vadehi.
anya-e0904n:490_0: Nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcana tatthi.
anya-e0904n:492_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyuposatho vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:493_2: upakkiliṭṭhassa visākhe cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
anya-e0904n:493_3: Kathañca visākhe upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti.
anya-e0904n:493_4: Idha visākhe ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
anya-e0904n:493_5: sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0904n:493_8: ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyantīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyo uposatho vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:494_1: evaṃ upavutthassa pana āvuso ariyuposathassa kathaṃ mahapphalatā mahānisaṃsatā vuttā bhagavatā.
anya-e0904n:495_5: seyyathāpi visākhe yo imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ mahājanapadānaṃ pahūtarattajanapadānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreyya,
anya-e0904n:495_6: seyyathidaṃ “aṅgānaṃ magadhānaṃ kāsīnaṃ kosalānaṃ vajjīnaṃ mallānaṃ cetīnaṃ vaṅgānaṃ kurūnaṃ pañcālānaṃ
anya-e0904n:495_7: macchānaṃ sūrasenānaṃ assakānaṃ avantīnaṃ gandhārānaṃ kambojānaṃ,
anya-e0904n:495_8: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa uposathassa etaṃ kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā evaṃ
anya-e0904n:498_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso tikanipāte ānandavagge dutiyaṃ ājīvakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:499_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ ājīvakasāvakaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:499_2: Aññataro bhante ājīvakasāvako gahapati āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto,
anya-e0904n:499_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi gahapati taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0904n:499_7: tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:500_0: “Kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto, ke loke suppaṭipannā, ke loke sukatā”.
anya-e0904n:503_0: “Abhikkantaṃ bhante, abhikkantaṃ bhante, seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya” –
anya-e0904n:505_1: tattheva āvuso navamaṃ gandhajātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:506_2: Āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “tīṇimāni bhante gandhajātāni,
anya-e0904n:506_3: yesaṃ anuvātaṃyeva gandho gacchati no paṭivātaṃ…pe…
anya-e0904n:506_4: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci gandhajātaṃ,
anya-e0904n:506_5: yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati paṭivātampi gandho gacchati,
anya-e0904n:506_10: anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:512_0: Pucchā – samaṇavagge āvuso dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:513_1: samaṇavagge bhante dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave gadrabho gogaṇaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ‘ahampi dammo ahampi dammo’ti,
anya-e0904n:513_2: tassa na tādiso vaṇṇo hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ,
anya-e0904n:513_3: na tādiso saro hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ,
anya-e0904n:513_4: na tādisaṃ padaṃ hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ,
anya-e0904n:513_5: so gogaṇaṃyeva piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ahampi dammo ahampi dammo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:517_1: tattheva āvuso ekādasamaṃ saṅkavāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:518_1: kosalesu bhante saṅkavāyaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ nigame kassapagottaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:518_2: Kassapa gotto bhante bhikkhu bhagavati manopadūsitvā bhagavato santike accayaṃ accayato desesi.
anya-e0904n:518_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “thero cepi kassapa bhikkhu na sikkhākāmo na sikkhāsamādānassa vaṇṇavādī.
anya-e0904n:518_6: ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca na vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālenā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:521_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte loṇakapallavagge paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:522_1: loṇakapallavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
anya-e0904n:522_3: idha bhikkhave kassako gahapati sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti sumatikataṃ.
anya-e0904n:522_4: Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karitvā sumatikataṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0904n:522_5: Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ udakaṃ abhinetipi apanetipi.
anya-e0904n:522_6: Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:525_0: Pucchā – sambodhavagge panāvuso pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:526_1: sambodhavagge bhante pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ “ruṇṇamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ gītaṃ,
anya-e0904n:526_2: ummattakamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ naccaṃ,
anya-e0904n:526_3: komārakamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ ativelaṃ dantavidaṃsakahasitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:526_4: Tasmātiha bhikkhave setughāto gīte setughāto nacce,
anya-e0904n:526_5: alaṃ vo dhammappamoditānaṃ sataṃ sitaṃ sitamattāyā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:528_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ arakkhitasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:529_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anātapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “citte gahapati arakkhite kāyakammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n:529_4: Tassa arakkhitakāyakammantassa arakkhitavacīkammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi avassutaṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n:529_6: manokammampi avassutaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:532_0: Pucchā – āpāyikavagge āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:533_1: āpāyikavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vipattiyo.
anya-e0904n:533_8: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sīlavipattī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:536_1: kusināravagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ kusinārasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:537_1: kusinārāyaṃ bhante baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “idha bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,
anya-e0904n:537_2: tamenaṃ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimantetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:539_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ hatthakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:540_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante hatthakena devaputtena saddhiṃ “ye te hatthaka dhammā pubbe manussabhūtassa pavattino ahesuṃ,
anya-e0904n:540_2: apinu te te dhammā etarahi pavattino”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:542_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ anuruddhasuttaṃ kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:543_1: aṭṭhamaṃ bhante anuruddhasuttaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0904n:543_2: “yaṃ kho te āvuso anuruddhaṃ evaṃ hoti ‘ahaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ
anya-e0904n:544_0: “Sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharatu” –
anya-e0904n:547_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte kusināravagge navamaṃ paṭicchannasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:548_1: navamaṃ bhante paṭicchannasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave paṭicchannāni āvahanti no vivaṭāni.
anya-e0904n:548_3: mātugāmo bhikkhave paṭicchanno āvahati no vivaṭo,
anya-e0904n:548_4: brāhmaṇānaṃ bhikkhave mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti no vivaṭā,
anya-e0904n:548_5: micchādiṭṭhi bhikkhave paṭicchannā āvahati no vivaṭā.
anya-e0904n:548_6: Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti no vivaṭānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:550_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ lekhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:551_1: dasamaṃ bhante lekhasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:551_3: pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo pathavilekhūpamo puggalo udakalekhūpamo puggalo.
anya-e0904n:551_4: Katamo ca bhikkhave pāsāṇa lekhūpamo puggalo,
anya-e0904n:551_5: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati,
anya-e0904n:551_6: so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
anya-e0904n:551_7: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave pāsāṇalekhā na khippaṃ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā,
anya-e0904n:551_9: evameva kho bhikkhave idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati,
anya-e0904n:551_10: so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
anya-e0904n:551_11: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:554_0: Pucchā – yodhājīvavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:555_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ,
anya-e0904n:555_3: Kesakambalo bhikkhave sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso.
anya-e0904n:555_5: makkhalivādo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyatīti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:558_0: Pucchā – maṅgalavagge panāvuso navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:559_1: maṅgalavagge bhante navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā.
anya-e0904n:560_0: “Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā. Katamā tisso, kāyena vācāya manasā. Imā kho bhikkhave tisso vandanā”.
anya-e0904n:562_0: Pucchā – tattho āvuso dasamaṃ pubbaṇhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:563_1: dasamaṃ bhante pubbaṇhasuttaṃ “ye bhikkhave sattā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti,
anya-e0904n:563_9: Susāyanho bhikkhave tesaṃ sattāna”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:568_1: catukkanipāte pana āvuso bhaṇḍagāmavagge paṭhamaṃ anubuddhasuttaṃ bhagavatā sattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:569_1: vajjīsu bhante bhaṇḍagāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “catunnaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā
anya-e0904n:569_2: evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca.
anya-e0904n:569_4: ariyassa bhikkhave sīlassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca.
anya-e0904n:569_7: Ariyāya bhikkhave vimuttiyā ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva
anya-e0904n:571_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:572_1: tattha bhante chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:572_6: bahussuto sutena upapanno”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:575_0: Pu – caravagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ carasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:576_1: caravagge bhante paṭhamaṃ carasuttaṃ “carato cepi bhikkhave bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvibhatto vā,
anya-e0904n:576_2: taṃ ce bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gametī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:579_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte uruvelavagge tatiyaṃ lokasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:580_1: uruvelavagge bhante tatiyaṃ lokasuttaṃ “loko bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddho,
anya-e0904n:580_5: lokanirodho bhikkhave tathāgatena abhisambuddho lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato,
anya-e0904n:580_7: lokanirodhagāmini paṭipadā tathāgatassa bhāvitā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:614_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ brahmacariyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:615_1: pañcamaṃ bhante brahmacariyasuttaṃ “nayidaṃ bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhanatthaṃ,
anya-e0904n:615_6: Atha kho idaṃ bhikkhave brahmacariyaṃ vussati saṃvaratthaṃ pahānatthaṃ virāgatthaṃ nirodhattha”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:617_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ ariyavaṃsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:618_1: tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ ariyavaṃsasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā,
anya-e0904n:618_5: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
anya-e0904n:618_7: na ca cīvarahetu anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0904n:618_9: laddhā ca cīvaraṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhopanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati,
anya-e0904n:618_10: tāya ca pana itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā nevattānukkaṃseti no paraṃ vambheti.
anya-e0904n:618_11: Yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajāno paṭissabho,
anya-e0904n:618_12: ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu porāṇe aggaññe ariyavaṃse ṭhito”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:621_0: Pu – cakkavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ cakkasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:622_1: cakkavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ cakkasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave cakkāni,
anya-e0904n:622_3: yehi samannāgatā devamanussā nacirasseva mahantattaṃ vepullattaṃ pāpuṇanti bhogesu.
anya-e0904n:622_5: patirūpadesavāso sappurisāvassayo attasammāpaṇidhi pubbe ca katapuññatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:624_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ saṅgahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:625_1: tattheva bhante dutiyaṃ saṅgahasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave saṅgahavatthūni.
anya-e0904n:625_3: dānaṃ peyyavajjaṃ atthacariyā samānattatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:627_0: Pu – bhattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ sīhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:628_1: tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ sīhasuttaṃ “sīho bhikkhave migarājā sāyanusamayaṃ āsayā nikkhamati,
anya-e0904n:628_4: samantā catuddisā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati,
anya-e0904n:628_5: tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:630_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte cakkavagge chaṭṭhaṃ doṇasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:631_1: antarā ca bhante ukkaṭṭhaṃ antarā ca setabyaṃ doṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:631_2: Doṇo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “devo no bhavaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0904n:631_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇa devo bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:632_0: “Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho, na vatimāni manussabhūtassa padāni bhavissanti”.
anya-e0904n:638_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ ujjayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:639_1: navamaṃ bhante ujjayasuttaṃ “na kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ yaññaṃ vaṇṇemi,
anya-e0904n:639_2: na panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ yaññaṃ na vaṇṇemi.
anya-e0904n:639_3: Yathārūpe kho brāhmaṇa yaññe gāvo haññanti,
anya-e0904n:639_6: vividhā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpajjantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:643_0: Pu – rohitassavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ samādhibhāvanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:644_1: rohitassavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ samādhibhāvanāsuttaṃ “catasso imā bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā,
anya-e0904n:644_3: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n:644_4: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n:644_5: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṃvattati,
anya-e0904n:644_6: atthi bhikkhave samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:646_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ pañhabyākaraṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:647_1: tattheva bhante dutiyaṃ pañhabyākaraṇasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave pañhabyākaraṇāni.
anya-e0904n:647_6: atthi bhikkhave pañho ṭhapanīyo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:650_1: puññābhisandavagge pana āvuso tatiyaṃ saṃvāsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:651_1: puññābhisandavagge bhante tatiyaṃ saṃvāsasuttaṃ antarā ca madhuraṃ antarā ca verañjaṃ sambahule gahapatayo
anya-e0904n:651_2: ca gahapatāniyo ca ārabbha “cattārome gahapatayo saṃvāsā.
anya-e0904n:651_7: devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:653_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte puññābhisandavagge pañcamaṃ samajīvisuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:654_1: pañcamaṃ bhante samajīvisuttaṃ “ākaṅkheyyuṃ ce gahapatayo ubho jānipatayo diṭṭhe ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passituṃ,
anya-e0904n:654_3: ubhova assu samasaddhā samasīlā samacāgā samapaññā,
anya-e0904n:654_4: te diṭṭhe ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passanti,
anya-e0904n:654_5: abhisamparāyañca aññamaññaṃ passantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:657_1: pattakammavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ ānaṇyasukhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:658_1: pattakammavagge bhante dutiyaṃ ānaṇyasukhasuttaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “cattārimāni
anya-e0904n:658_2: gahapati sukhāni adhigamanīyāni gihinā kāmabhoginā kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ upādāya.
anya-e0904n:658_4: atthisukhaṃ bhogasukhaṃ anaṇyasukhaṃ anavajjasukha”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:660_0: Bhuñjaṃ bhogasukhaṃ macco, tato paññā vipassati;
anya-e0904n:665_0: Pu – apaṇṇakavagge pana āvuso tatiyaṃ sappurisasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:666_1: apaṇṇakavagge bhante tatiyaṃ sappurisasuttaṃ “catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato asappuriso veditabbo.
anya-e0904n:666_3: idha bhikkhave asappuriso yo hoti parassa avaṇṇo taṃ apuṭṭhopi pātu karoti ko pana vādo puṭṭhassā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:669_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ acinteyyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:670_1: sattamaṃ bhante acinteyyasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave acinteyyāni na cintetabbāni,
anya-e0904n:670_2: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa.
anya-e0904n:670_4: buddhānaṃ bhikkhave buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo,
anya-e0904n:670_5: yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:673_0: Pu – macalavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ tamotamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:674_1: macalavagge bhante pañcamaṃ tamotamasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:677_2: sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte asuravagge paṭhamaṃ asurasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:678_1: asuravagge bhante paṭhamaṃ asurasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:680_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ samādhisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:681_1: catutthaṃ bhante samādhisuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:681_3: idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.
anya-e0904n:681_4: Idha pana bhikkhave puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya,
anya-e0904n:681_6: Idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo na ceva lābhī hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa,
anya-e0904n:681_8: Idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa,
anya-e0904n:681_9: lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:683_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ rāgavinayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:684_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante rāgavinayasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:684_6: attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:687_1: valāhakavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ valāhakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:688_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “cattārome bhikkhave valāhakā.
anya-e0904n:688_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjāmānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:688_13: gajjitā ca vassitā cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:690_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ udakarahadasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:691_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro udakarahadūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:693_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mūsikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:694_1: sattamaṃ bhante mūsikasuttaṃ “catasso imā bhikkhave mūsikā.
anya-e0904n:694_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro mūsikūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0904n:694_13: gādhaṃ kattā ca vasitā cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:696_1: saṃgītāpi āvuso aṅguttaranikāyato kānici suttāni uddharitvā paṭipucchissāmi bahujanassa sutavuḍḍhiyā.
anya-e0904n:696_2: Saṃgīte āvuso aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte valāhakavagge aṭṭhamaṃ balībaddhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:697_1: valāhakavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ balībaddhasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave balībaddhā.
anya-e0904n:697_8: Evameva kho bhikkhave cattāro balībaddhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:699_1: kesivagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ kesisuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:700_2: Kesi bhante assadammasārathi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “bhagavā pana bhante anuttaro purisadammasārathi,
anya-e0904n:700_3: kathaṃ pana bhante bhagavā purisadammaṃ vinetī”ti.
anya-e0904n:700_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ahaṃ kho kesi purisadammaṃ saṇhenapi vinemi,
anya-e0904n:700_11: iti devā iti manussā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:701_0: “Tvaṃ khosi kesi paññāto assadammasārathīti, kathaṃ pana tvaṃ kesi assadammasārathi” –
anya-e0904n:702_0: “Ahaṃ kho bhante assadammaṃ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemi” –
anya-e0904n:703_0: “Sace te kesi assadammo saṇhena vinayaṃ na upeti,
anya-e0904n:704_0: “Bhagavā pana bhante anuttaro purisadammasārathi, kathaṃ pana bhante bhagavā purisadammaṃ vineti” –
anya-e0904n:705_0: Na 0.0087 kho bhante bhagavato pāṇātipāto kappati, atha ca pana bhagavā evamāha “hanāmi naṃ kesī”ti.
anya-e0904n:707_0: Pu – bhayavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ attānuvādasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:708_1: bhayavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ attānuvādasuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave bhayāni.
anya-e0904n:708_3: attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhaya”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:710_1: idāni āvuso bahujanassa sutavuḍḍhiyā saṃgītā aṅguttaranikāyatopi kānici suttāni uddharitvā paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0904n:710_2: saṃgīte āvuso aṅguttaranikāye catukkanipāte puggalavagge navamaṃ dhammakathikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:711_1: puggalavagge bhante navamaṃ dhammakathikasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave dhammakathikā.
anya-e0904n:711_3: idha bhikkhave ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati asahitañca,
anya-e0904n:711_4: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
anya-e0904n:711_5: Evarūpo bhikkhave dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:713_0: Pu – indriyavagge pana āvuso sattamaṃ rogasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:714_5: Dissanti bhikkhave sattā kāyikena rogena ekampi vassaṃ ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā dvepi vassāni tīṇipi vassāni
anya-e0904n:714_6: cattāripi vassāni pañcapi vassāni dasapi vassāni vīsampi vassāni tiṃsampi vassāni cattārīsampi vassāni
anya-e0904n:714_7: paññāsampi vassāni ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā vassasatampi bhiyyopi ārogyaṃ paṭijānamānā.
anya-e0904n:714_9: ye cetasikena rogena muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijānanti aññatra khīṇāsavehī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:717_0: Pu – paṭipadāvagge āvuso dasamaṃ yuganaddhasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:718_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “yo hi koci āvuso bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti,
anya-e0904n:718_2: sabbo so catūhi maggehi etesaṃ vā aññatarenā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:720_0: Pu – brāhmaṇavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ pāṭibhogasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:721_1: brāhmaṇavagge bhante dutiyaṃ pāṭibhogasuttaṃ “catunnaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ natthi koci pāṭibhogo samaṇo
