anya-e0904n:721_2: vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:723_1: tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ sutasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:724_1: rājagahe bhante vassakāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ magadhamahāmattaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:724_2: Vassakāro bhante brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi yo koci diṭṭhaṃ bhāsati ‘evaṃ me diṭṭha’nti,
anya-e0904n:724_4: Yo koci sutaṃ bhāsati ‘evaṃ me suta’nti,
anya-e0904n:724_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “nāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ‘bhāsitabba’nti vadāmi,
anya-e0904n:724_7: na panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ‘na bhāsitabba’nti vadāmi,
anya-e0904n:724_9: na panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa sabbaṃ sutaṃ ‘na bhāsitabba’nti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:726_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte brāhmaṇavagge catutthaṃ abhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:727_1: brāhmaṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ abhayasuttaṃ jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:727_2: Jāṇussoṇi bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “natthi yo maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati,
anya-e0904n:727_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “atthi brāhmaṇa maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati,
anya-e0904n:727_6: Atthi pana brāhmaṇa maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati,
anya-e0904n:727_7: na santāsaṃ āpajjati maraṇassā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:729_0: Pu – mahāvagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sotānugatasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:730_1: mahāvagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sotānugatasuttaṃ “sotānugatānaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ vacasā paricitānaṃ manasānupekkhitānaṃ
anya-e0904n:730_2: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:731_0: Ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acariṃ.
anya-e0904n:733_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte mahāvagge tatiyaṃ bhaddiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:734_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante bhaddiyaṃ licchavi ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:734_2: Bhaddiyo bhante licchavi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante ‘māyāvī samaṇo gotamo āvaṭṭaniṃ māyaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0904n:734_4: Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘māyāvī samaṇo gotamo āvaṭṭaniṃ māyaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0904n:734_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “etha tumhe bhaddiya mā anussavena mā paramparāya mā itikirāya mā piṭakasampadānena
anya-e0904n:734_8: mā takkahetu mā nayahetu mā ākāravitakkena mā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā mā bhabbarūpatāya mā samaṇo no garūti.
anya-e0904n:734_9: Yadā tumhe bhaddiya attanāva jāneyyātha ‘ime dhammā akusalā,
anya-e0904n:734_12: ime dhammā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī’ti.
anya-e0904n:734_13: Atha tumhe bhaddiya pajaheyyāthā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:735_1: imissā ca pana āvuso desanāya desitāya bhaddiyassa licchavissa kīdiso dhammasavanānisaṃso adhigato.
anya-e0904n:735_2: Kathañca naṃ bhagavā anuyuñjitvā taṃ vacanaṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0904n:736_1: imissā bhante dhammadesanāya desitāya bhaddiyassa licchavissa sotāpattiphalasaṅkhāto dhammasavanānisaṃso adhigato.
anya-e0904n:736_2: Api nu tāhaṃ bhaddiya evaṃ avacaṃ “ehi me tvaṃ bhaddiya sāvako hohi,
anya-e0904n:736_3: ahaṃ satthā bhavissāmī”ti evamādinā ca naṃ bhante bhagavā paṭipucchitvā anuyuñjitvā taṃ vacanaṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0904n:738_1: tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mallikādevīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:739_2: Mallikā bhante devī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n:739_3: yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya,
anya-e0904n:739_4: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca…pe…
anya-e0904n:739_5: ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0904n:739_6: yena midhekacco mātugāmo abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā,
anya-e0904n:739_7: aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā cā”ti.
anya-e0904n:739_8: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “idha mallike mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:741_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso catukkanipāte sappurisavagge catutthaṃ dasakammasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:742_1: sappurisavagge bhante catutthaṃ dasakammasuttaṃ “asappurisañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi asappurisena asappurisatarañca
anya-e0904n:742_3: taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:744_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso parisāvagge paṭhamaṃ parisāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:745_1: parisāvagge bhante paṭhamaṃ parisāsuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave parisadūsanā.
anya-e0904n:745_7: Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro parisadūsanā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:748_1: pañcakanipāte pana āvuso paṭhame sekhabalavagge paṭhamaṃ saṃkhittasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:749_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “pañcimāni bhikkhave sekhabalāni.
anya-e0904n:749_4: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca sekhabalānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:751_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ dukkhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:752_1: tatiyaṃ bhante dukkhasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati
anya-e0904n:752_2: savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ kāyassa ca bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
anya-e0904n:752_4: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu asaddho hoti ahiriko hoti,
anya-e0904n:754_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ samāpattisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:755_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante samāpattisuttaṃ “na tāva bhikkhave akusalassa samāpatti hoti,
anya-e0904n:755_2: yāva saddhā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0904n:755_3: Yato ca kho bhikkhave saddhā antarahitā hoti asaddhiyaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0904n:755_4: atha akusalassa samāpatti hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:757_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ kāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:758_1: sattamaṃ bhante kāmasuttaṃ “yebhuyyena bhikkhave sattā kāmesu laḷitā.
anya-e0904n:758_2: Asitabyābhaṅgiṃ bhikkhave kulaputto ohāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0904n:758_3: saddhāpabbajito kulaputtoti alaṃ vacanāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:760_1: aṅguttaranikāye pañcakanipāte pañcaṅgikavagge chaṭṭhaṃ vimuttāyatanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:761_1: pañcaṅgikavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ vimuttāyatanasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave vimuttāyatanāni,
anya-e0904n:761_2: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ vimuccati,
anya-e0904n:761_4: ananuppattaṃ vā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ anupāpuṇātī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:763_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ caṅkamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:764_1: navamaṃ bhante caṅkamasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave caṅkame ānisaṃsā.
anya-e0904n:764_6: asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0904n:764_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:766_1: sumanavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sumanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:767_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sumanaṃ rājakumāriṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:767_2: Sumanā bhante rājakumārī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idhassu bhante bhagavato dve sāvakā samasaddhā samasīlā samapaññā eko dāyako eko adāyako.
anya-e0904n:767_3: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0904n:767_4: Devabhūtānaṃ pana nesaṃ bhante siyā viseso siyā nānākaraṇa”nti.
anya-e0904n:767_5: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yo so sumane dāyako,
anya-e0904n:767_6: so amhaṃ adāyakaṃ devabhūto samāno pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti,
anya-e0904n:767_7: dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbena ādhipateyyena.
anya-e0904n:767_9: so amhaṃ adāyakaṃ devabhūto samāno imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhātī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:773_1: tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ uggahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:774_1: tatiyaṃ bhante uggahasuttaṃ bhaddiye uggahaṃ meṇḍakanattāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:774_2: Uggaho bhante meṇḍakanattā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “imā me bhante kumāriyo patikulāni gamissanti,
anya-e0904n:774_5: yaṃ tāsaṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
anya-e0904n:774_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha kumāriyo evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ” yassa vo mātāpitaro bhattuno dassanti
anya-e0904n:774_8: tassa bhavissāma pubbuṭṭhāyino pacchānipātiniyo kiṃ kārapaṭissāviniyo manāpacāriniyo piyavādiniyo’ti.
anya-e0904n:774_9: Evañhi vo kumāriyo sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:776_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte sumanavagge catutthaṃ sīhasenāpatisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:777_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:777_2: Sīho bhante senāpati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sakkā nu kho bhante sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ paññāpetu”nti.
anya-e0904n:777_4: dāyako sīha dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:779_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ kāladānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:780_9: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca kāladānānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:782_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ bhojanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:783_1: sattamaṃ bhante bhojanasuttaṃ “bhojanaṃ bhikkhave dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṃ pañca ṭhānāni deti.
anya-e0904n:783_8: Āyuṃ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:785_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ puttasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:786_1: navamaṃ bhante puttasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni sampassanto mābhāpitaro puttaṃ icchanti kule jāyamānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:789_1: muṇḍarājavagge panāvuso dasamaṃ nāradasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:790_1: pāṭaliputte bhante muṇḍaṃ rājānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:790_2: Muṇḍassa bhante rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā.
anya-e0904n:790_3: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e0904n:790_6: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pañcimāni mahārāja alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā
anya-e0904n:790_7: mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā nāradattherena rañño pasenadissa
anya-e0904n:794_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte nīvaraṇavagge catutthaṃ samayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:795_1: nīvaraṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ samayasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave asamayā padhānāya.
anya-e0904n:795_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu jiṇṇo hoti jarāyābhibhūto.
anya-e0904n:795_4: Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo asamayo padhānāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:797_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ ṭhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:798_1: sattamaṃ bhante ṭhānasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbāni itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
anya-e0904n:798_3: jarādhammomhi jaraṃ anatītoti abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:800_0: Pu – yodhājīvavagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ dhammavihārisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:801_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante tatiyaṃ dhammavihārisuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ
anya-e0904n:801_2: veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ dutivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ,
anya-e0904n:801_6: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhu bhikkhu pariyattibahulo no dhammavihārī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:802_0: Dhammavihārī dhammavihārīti bhante vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
anya-e0904n:804_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte yodhājīvavagge aṭṭhamaṃ dutiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:805_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ dutiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena
anya-e0904n:805_2: alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya
anya-e0904n:807_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ tatiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:808_1: tattheva bhante navamaṃ katiyaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṃ samuppajjissanti,
anya-e0904n:808_5: bhavissanti bhikkhave bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṃ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:810_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte yodhājīvavagge dasamaṃ catutthaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:811_1: yodhājīvavagge bhante dasamaṃ catutthaanāgatabhayasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṃ samuppajjissanti,
anya-e0904n:811_3: paṭibujjhitvā ca tesaṃ pahānāya vāyamitabba”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:814_0: Pu – kakudhavagge āvuso navamaṃ sīhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:815_1: kakudhavagge bhante navamaṃ sīhasuttaṃ “sīho bhikkhave migarājā sāyanhasamayaṃ āsayā nikkhamati,
anya-e0904n:815_4: samantā catuddisaṃ anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:818_0: Pu – andhakavindavagge pana āvuso “paṭhamaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:819_1: andhakavindavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu
anya-e0904n:819_2: kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo cā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:821_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ andhakavindasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:822_1: magadhesu bhante andhakavinde āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha “ye te ānanda bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ,
anya-e0904n:822_2: te vo ānanda bhikkhū pañcasu dhammesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:825_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte gilānavagge dutiyaṃ satisūpaṭṭhitasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:826_1: gilānavagge bhante dutiyaṃ satisūpaṭṭhitasuttaṃ “yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā pañca dhamme bhāveti,
anya-e0904n:826_3: tassa dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ ‘diṭṭheva dhamme aññā,
anya-e0904n:826_6: idha bhikkhave bhikkhuno ajjhattaññeva satisūpaṭṭhitā hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:828_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ upaṭṭhākasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:829_1: tatiyaṃ bhante upaṭṭhākasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato gilāno dūpaṭṭhāko hoti.
anya-e0904n:829_5: bhesajjaṃ nappaṭisevitā hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:831_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ anāyussāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:832_1: pañcamaṃ bhante anāyussāsuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā anāyussā.
anya-e0904n:832_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā anāyussā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:834_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ samaṇasukhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:835_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
anya-e0904n:835_8: Imāni kho bhikkhave pañca samaṇadukkhānī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:837_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ byasanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:838_3: ñātibyasanaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ sīlabyasanaṃ diṭṭhibyasana”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:841_0: Pu – rājavagge pana āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ patthanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:842_1: rājavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ patthanāsuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa
anya-e0904n:842_2: jeṭṭho putto oparajjaṃ patthetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:844_0: Pu – tikaṇḍakīvagge āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ sappurisadānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:845_1: tikaṇḍakīvagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ sappurisadānasuttaṃ “pañcimāni bhikkhave sappurisadānāni.
anya-e0904n:845_7: attānañca parañca anupahacca dānaṃ detī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:848_0: Pu – saddhammavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sammattaniyāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:849_1: saddhammavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sammattaniyāmasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato sunakkhopi
anya-e0904n:849_2: saddhammaṃ abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
anya-e0904n:851_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ paṭhamasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:852_1: tattheva bhante catutthaṃ paṭhamasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n:852_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhū na sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanti,
anya-e0904n:852_6: na sakkaccaṃ dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti,
anya-e0904n:852_7: na sakkaccaṃ atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjanti.
anya-e0904n:852_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:854_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ dutiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:855_1: tattheva bhante pañcamaṃ dutiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n:855_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhū dhammaṃ na pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
anya-e0904n:855_4: Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:857_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ tatiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:858_1: tattheva bhante chaṭṭhaṃ tatiyasaddhammasammosasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0904n:858_3: idha bhikkhave bhikkhū duggahitaṃ suttantaṃ pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittahi padabyañjanehi.
anya-e0904n:858_4: Dunnikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
anya-e0904n:858_5: Ayaṃ bhikkhave paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:860_1: aṅguttaranikāye āvuso pañcakanipāte saddhammavagge sattamaṃ dukkathāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:861_1: saddhammavagge bhante sattamaṃ dukkathāsuttaṃ “pañcannaṃ bhikkhave puggalānaṃ kathā dukkathā puggale puggalaṃ upanidhāya.
anya-e0904n:861_7: duppaññassa paññākathā dukkathā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:863_1: tattheva āvuso navamaṃ udāyisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:864_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:864_2: Āyasmā bhante udāyī mahatiyā gīhiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
anya-e0904n:864_3: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ nisinnaṃ.
anya-e0904n:864_6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “āyasmā bhante udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
anya-e0904n:864_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na kho ānanda sukaraṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ,
anya-e0904n:864_8: paresaṃ ānanda dhammaṃ desentena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:867_0: Pu – āghātavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ āghātapaṭivinayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:868_1: āghātavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ āghātapaṭivinayasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave āghātapaṭivinayā,
anya-e0904n:868_2: yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
anya-e0904n:868_6: evaṃ tasmiṃ puggale āghāto paṭivinetabbo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:871_0: Pu – upāsakavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ caṇḍālasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:872_1: upāsakavagge bhante pañcamaṃ caṇḍālasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo
anya-e0904n:872_2: ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:874_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ pītisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:875_1: chaṭṭhaṃ bhante pītisuttaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “tumhe kho gahapati bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e0904n:875_3: Na kho gahapati tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhi karaṇīyā “mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilāna paccaya bhesajjaparikkhārenā”ti.
anya-e0904n:875_4: Tasmātiha gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “kindi mayaṃ kālena kālaṃ pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja vihareyyāmā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:877_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ vaṇijjāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:878_1: tattheva bhante sattamaṃ vaṇijjāsuttaṃ “pañcimā bhikkhave vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā.
anya-e0904n:878_4: Imā kho bhikkhave pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:880_1: tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ gavesīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:881_1: dasamaṃ bhante gavesīsuttaṃ kosalesu āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:881_2: Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya,
anya-e0904n:881_4: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “bhūtapubbaṃ ānanda imasmiṃ padese nagaraṃ ahosi iddhañceva phītañca bahujanaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ,
anya-e0904n:881_5: taṃ kho panānanda nagaraṃ kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:883_0: Pu – brāhmaṇavagge āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ vācāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:884_1: brāhmaṇavagge bhante aṭṭhamaṃ vācāsuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā,
anya-e0904n:884_9: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā,
anya-e0904n:884_10: anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūna”nti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:886_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ kulasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:887_1: tattheva bhante navamaṃ kulasuttaṃ “yaṃ bhikkhave sīlavanto pabbajitā kulaṃ upasaṅkamanti,
anya-e0904n:887_2: tattha manussā pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti.
anya-e0904n:887_4: yasmiṃ bhikkhave samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā disvā cittāni pasādenti,
anya-e0904n:887_5: saggasaṃvattanikaṃ bhikkhave taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:890_0: Pu – kimilavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ dhammassavanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:891_1: kimilavagge bhante dutiyaṃ dhammassavanasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṃsā dhammassavane.
anya-e0904n:891_8: ime kho bhikkhave pañca ānisaṃsā dhammassavane”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:894_0: Pu – akkosakavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ akkhantisuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:895_1: akkosakavagge bhante pañcamaṃ akkhantisuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
anya-e0904n:895_7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:897_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ apāsādikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:898_1: tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ apāsādikasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā apāsādike.
anya-e0904n:898_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā apāsādike”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:901_0: Pu – āvāsikavagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ āvāsikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:902_1: āvāsikavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ āvāsikasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti.
anya-e0904n:902_8: Imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:904_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:905_1: tattheva bhante sattamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ “pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
anya-e0904n:905_8: Imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:908_0: Pu – duccaritavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ duccaritasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:909_1: duccaritavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ duccaritasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā duccarite.
anya-e0904n:909_7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0904n:909_8: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā duccarite”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:911_0: Pu – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ sivathikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:912_1: tattheva bhante navamaṃ sivathikasuttaṃ “pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavā sivathikāya.
anya-e0904n:912_7: Ime kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavā sivathikāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
